Header: New Ministers take their oaths before the President
Content: Parliamentarian A.H.M. Fawzi took his oaths as a State Minister before President Maithripala Sirisena today. He took his oaths as the state minister of National Integration, Co-existence and Islam Religious Affairs. Meanwhile Parliamentarian S.B. Navinna who represented United National Front, took oaths as the Minister of Cultural, Internal Affairs and Regional Development yesterday before the President. Tamil National Alliance Parliamentarian S. Viyalendiran took his oaths as the Deputy Minister of Eastern Province Development at the Presidential Secretariat yesterday.
